Package org.treetank.exception

Exception Layer

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TTByteHandleException
    Exception type for handle everything related to the handling of bytes especially within the io-layer.
    TTException
    Exception to hold all relevant failures upcoming from Treetank.
    TTIOException
    All Treetank IO Exception are wrapped in this class.
    TTThreadedException
    This class holds all exceptions which can occure with the usage of multithreaded exceptions.
    TTUsageException
    Exception throw when an incorrect usage of Treetank occur.
    TTXPathException
    Static class for handling the Enum as an TTException.

Package org.treetank.exception Description

Exception Layer

All exceptions thrown by Treetank are instance of these classes.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
